The wolf maximal was caught in the back, but recovered quickly. He 
turned and faced the predacon.

Blackfang: I think you have something that belongs to me, vile one. I 
will take it back!

He hurls himself forward, slashing twice with his halberd.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> Perceptor::
> 
> "Me!!!!" replied Perceptor while he opened fire against BLackfang's 
> Back
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "warriorazure" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > Blackfang leaps, transforms in mid-air, takes hold of his halberd 
> and 
> > glares around furiously.
> > 
> > Blackfang: Who's up for some scrap rattling?
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@c...> wrote:
> > > ::Rodimus Prime::
> > > 
> > > "That's correct Blackfang. We only atack the Predacons. Leave 
the 
> > other group. Only attack them if pervoked."
> > > 
> > > They come into the battle.
> > > 
> > > "Here we are, Maximals kick ass!"
> > > 
> > > Rodimus transformed to bot mode, and fires on the Predacon base 
> with 
> > his plasma gun.
